channel.title: {ERROR}{317}{DELTA} Runserver.bat error PLEASE HELP
channel.description:
Ok, so first of people may flame me because.. Im using delta, and my 1 post count..... but i used to play RSPS alot before and i decided to come back to it to help develop my java skills. Here is my problem. Imagine and delta source, it doesnt matter when i click runserver.bat it runs, i can play it. But when i compile, ill get no errors !SUCESSFULL EDIT! However when i click runserver.bat to check if the spawn point moved or not. i get this annoying error. [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: server : Unsu pported major.minor version 51.0 at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClassCond(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code] On my pc i only have JDK AND JRE 7, because i have a new pc. *NOTE I HAVE CHANGED THE PATHS ON THE RUNSERVER BEFORE RUNNING IT THE FIRST TIME* I have also added all the necessary Enviroment Variables. I would really appreciate some help here!!! :) Thanks in advance. :D :D :D
ALSO IF YOU REALLY NEED TO SEE THE SOURCE OR CODE... IM NOT GONNA PUT IT UP NOW, I WILL ON REQUEST!

item.title: {ERROR}{317}{DELTA} Runserver.bat error PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @Dracosense Dracosense
item.description:
@Dracosense wrote:

[quote=“Skiire, post:6, topic:437161”][quote author=Dracosense link=topic=539876.msg3952670#msg3952670 date=1332436638]
Well same error,
this is my runserver.bat idk what any of it meanss

@echo off title LearningJavaScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause

Sorry about my Grammar, Its terrible today.

PLEASE PLEASE HELP ME.
[/quote]

They have. You’re simply doing it incorrectly, plain and simple.

UnsupportedClassVersionError solutions:

  1. Find out which class file this UnSupportedClassVersionError is coming.
  2. Try to compile source code of that class with the JDK version you are using to run your program.
  3. Increase the JRE version you are using to run your program.

Each and every time the JVM tries to load a class and finds a class file version that is not supported it throws UnSupportedClassVersionError and it generally occurs if a higher JDK version is used to compile the source file and a lower JDK version is used to run the program.[/quote]

ERM, i just uninstalled BlueJ because im using Netbeans and now it works…
HOW DID THAT WORK???

Read full topic

item.title: {ERROR}{317}{DELTA} Runserver.bat error PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

[quote=“Dracosense, post:5, topic:437161”]Well same error,
this is my runserver.bat idk what any of it meanss

@echo off title LearningJavaScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server pause

Sorry about my Grammar, Its terrible today.

PLEASE PLEASE HELP ME.[/quote]

They have. You’re simply doing it incorrectly, plain and simple.

UnsupportedClassVersionError solutions:

  1. Find out which class file this UnSupportedClassVersionError is coming.
  2. Try to compile source code of that class with the JDK version you are using to run your program.
  3. Increase the JRE version you are using to run your program.

Each and every time the JVM tries to load a class and finds a class file version that is not supported it throws UnSupportedClassVersionError and it generally occurs if a higher JDK version is used to compile the source file and a lower JDK version is used to run the program.

Read full topic

item.title: {ERROR}{317}{DELTA} Runserver.bat error PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @xI_c_E xI c E
item.description:
@xI_c_E wrote:

[quote=“Dracosense, post:3, topic:437161”]Already have, added the path.
STILL DOESNT WORK SAME ERROR, SAME EVERYTHING.

ACTUALLY I RAN THE SECOND TIME… I GOT THIS
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: Bad version n
umber in .class file
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$100(Unknown Source)
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source)
Press any key to continue . . .[/quote]

Recompile your files and then try to run it.

Read full topic
